replies.bodyText: The constructor of the concrete implementation is package-private and takes the builder as an argument, and that constructor is called from build inside the concrete implementation of the builder. I guess to be more sure we would wrap it I could make this a method exit advice on the builder constructor. Though Spring has hidden these classes so it would be extremely unusual for someone to do this without the builder
